app_descript:
App Name: Sculpt People

Brief: Unleash your inner sculptor with Sculpt People, a tranquil, yet enthralling 3D sculpting simulator game. Dive into a world of artistic expression where clay becomes your canvas and creativity knows no bounds. Customize, mold, paint, and transform ordinary clay dough into stunning works of art, all while soothing your mind and shedding the day's stress.
